remarks: Part 15 of [Baer] p. 50 line 16.  The multiplication is reversed after converting to the dual space scalar to the vector space scalar. (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapmul.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapmul.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapmul.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
hgmapmul.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapmul.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapmul.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
hgmapmul.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
hgmapmul $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( G ` Y ) .x. ( G ` X ) ) ) $.
